label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_030
content:

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] Storage cluster capacity high on nodes: 94 nodes over 80% utilization, 41 over 90%, hottest node at 98.4%
- [WARNING] Quota enforcement: 9 tenants over quota, 49 soft limit hits, 8 hard blocks
- [INFO] Storage efficiency: Compression ratio 1.71, dedupe ratio 1.01, garbage 8.4%, tombstone 5.6%
- [CRITICAL] Disk failure: 1 disk failed, 1 rebuild completed in 7.3 hours
- [WARNING] Node restart: 1 node restarted
- [WARNING] Unhealthy OSDs: 3
- [WARNING] Scrub errors: 36
- [INFO] Network drops: 24
- [INFO] Metadata database size: 1361 GB
- [CRITICAL] Manifest backlog: 5600 entries
- [INFO] Metadata QPS (p95): 86000
- [INFO] Metadata cache hit rate: 87.4%
- [INFO] Firmware updates: 0
- [INFO] Kernel patches: 0
- [INFO] Rack power cycles: 0
- [INFO] Audit log size: 96 GB

### Deployments & Changes
- Emergency space recovery actions (tenant deletions + archival) increased egress to 168 TB; quota hard blocks reduced from 9 to 8; manifest backlog dropped to 5.6k.
- Continuous compaction mode reduced pending from 164 to 120; scrub errors decreased to 36; disk busy under 96%.
- Completed 17 rebalance jobs; skew index 1.00; no node exceeded 99% used during recovery.
- Disk failure replaced and rebuilt in 7.3 hours; limited writes re-enabled for two namespaces after quota and headroom confirmation.

### Events
- Emergency space recovery actions increased egress to 168 TB; quota hard blocks reduced from 9 to 8; manifest backlog dropped to 5.6k.
- Continuous compaction mode reduced pending from 164 to 120; scrub errors decreased to 36 while disk busy remained under 96%.
- 17 rebalance jobs completed, skew index 1.00, no node exceeded 99% utilization during recovery.
- Disk failure replaced and rebuilt in 7.3 hours; limited writes re-enabled for two namespaces after confirming quota compliance and headroom.

### On-Call
- Shift: Yara M. 12 pages. 20 tickets. Status: Degraded/Critical; slight recovery via deletions and continuous compaction, but cluster remains above 93% utilized with strict governance and limited write allowances.
